title: 报错问题！！！！急！！！
author: Evo.Yyc/郁冬
txt_content:
[22:17:01] [Server thread/WARN]: [EpicCraftingsPlus] Task #66 for EpicCraftingsPlus v2.26.2 generated an exception
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -12
        at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1967) ~[?:1.8.0_162]
        at ecp.ajneb97.events.CheckCooldown.buscarJugadores(CheckCooldown.java:46) ~[?:?]
        at ecp.ajneb97.events.CheckCooldown$1.run(CheckCooldown.java:27) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58) ~[1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:356) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:833) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:426) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:767) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:665) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1298]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_162]

求告知Ecraft插件报错怎么修！！！急！！！！

replies.txt_content: 删除配置重载配置，再覆盖备份配置即可。
